sn22.51:1.2: “Aniccanneva, bhikkhave, bhikkhu rupam aniccanti passati. Sassa hoti sammaditthi.
sn22.51:1.6: Aniccanneva, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vedanam aniccanti passati. Sassa hoti sammaditthi.
sn22.51:1.10: Aniccanneva, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sannam aniccanti passati …pe…
sn22.51:1.11: anicceyeva bhikkhave, bhikkhu sankhare aniccati passati. Sassa hoti sammaditthi.
sn22.51:1.15: Aniccanneva, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vinnanam aniccanti passati. Sassa hoti sammaditthi.
